title: I having problem with my client please help (Error code 003)
body:

It's say "Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching.

2. try to reinstall the game,
3. try to  delete Rads->projects->lol_game_client ->releases
4. try to repatch

6. and other solution from YouTube and website also forum...
but i still can't fix it...
If you guys have any solution please help me with this problem :(
